snippet: The high school student was wounded in the back after he apparently tried to thwart a group of armed men trying to rob another student, the police said.
abstract: Four suspects are arrested and charged in shooting of 17-year-old Brooklyn student who apparently tried to stop an armed robbery of another student in Brighton Beach.
lead_paragraph: The high school student was wounded in the back after he apparently tried to thwart a group of armed men trying to rob another student, the police said.

headline.seo: High School Student Shot in Brighton Beach
headline.main: Student, 17, Is Shot in Brighton Beach
headline.print_headline: Student, 17, Is Shot In Brighton Beach
